channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins useMango Runner Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins useMango Runner Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2176|2024-08-04T07:01:40.800Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20usemango%20runner%20plugin
item.description: Multiple form validation endpoints in Jenkins useMango Runner Plugin 1.4 and earlier do not escape values received from the useMango service, resulting in a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users able to control the values returned from the useMango service.
